attributes.action: Pay teaching assistants a fair and reasonable wage.
attributes.background: Most teaching assistants don't pay tax as they don't earn enough money! We teach your children to read and write.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could explain what you think a fair and reasonable wage for a teaching assistant would be.
